mapper.select: select t1.name, t2.id as sub_id, t2.name as sub_name, t2.path as sub_path, t2.authorization_flag as sub_authorization_flag from sys_permission t1 left join sys_permission t2 on t1.id = t2.parent_id where t1.parent_id = 0 order by t1.z_index;
select id,name from sys_permission where is_menu = 1;
select z_index from sys_permission where id = #{id};

select p.* from t_user u left join sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join sys_role r on ur.role_id = r.id left join sys_role_permission rp on r.id = rp.role_id left join sys_permission p on rp.permission_id = p.id where u.id = #{userId};
